site.page.error404.button: Notify about a new park volunteer activity
site.page.manage_events.title: Park volunteer activities
site.page.landing.hero.headline: Take part in volunteer activities
site.page.landing.hero.introduction: The City of Helsinki has supported volunteer activities organised by local residents since 1984. The City of Helsinki supports volunteer activities by lending equipment and removing the litter that has been collected. More than 20,000 local residents take part in these volunteer activities each year. Notify about your own park volunteer activity today!
site.page.landing.hero.call_to_action: Take part in a volunteer activity!
site.page.landing.hero.button: Notify about a new park volunteer activity
site.page.thank_you.page_title: Thank you for notifying about a new activity
site.page.thank_you.header: Thank you for notifying about a new activity!
site.page.thank_you.paragraph: Your notification has been added to the service. You will receive a confirmation message and further information about practical arrangements as soon as we have reviewed the details in your notification. Together we can create an even better urban environment!
site.page.error.heading: Oops! An error occurred
site.page.error.default_message: An error occurred in the system. Please try again or return to the homepage
site.page.access_denied.heading: Oops! Access denied.
site.page.access_denied.message: You are not authorised to open this page.
site.page.access_denied.contact_admin: If you believe this is an error, please contact the administrator.
site.report.title: Spring cleaning activities
form.validation.date.endtime: Start time must be before end time
form.validation.number.positive_or_zero: Number must be positive or zero!
form.validation.string.matches: The field must be in the given format!
form.validation.string.email: The field must be an e-mail address!
form.validation.map: Select a place on the map
form.validation.contract_zone: Volunteer activities are not possible in this area.
map.legend.title: Events on the map:
form.event.new.info:
Equipment will be delivered to the agreed location before the start of volunteer activities and picked up again afterwards together with the litter that has been collected. 

The system will automatically assign an address according to the location of the volunteer activities, but the equipment can also be delivered elsewhere. In addition to the address, you can provide a description of the location. For example: Castréninkatu 4, Toinen Linja playground, by the entrance to the building. If the volunteer activity takes place on a weekend, the equipment will be delivered on the preceding weekday and picked up on the following weekday.
form.event.modify.heading: Edit activity
form.event.modify.infoText:
Nice to hear that you want to arrange a volunteer event in the park!
 Please fill in the form below. All fields are mandatory if not otherwise stated.
form.event.new.page_title: Notify about a new park volunteer activity
form.event.new.heading: Notify about a new park volunteer activity
form.event.new.infoText:
Nice to hear that you want to arrange a volunteer event in the park!
 Please fill in the form below. All fields are mandatory if not otherwise stated.
form.event.new.location_instructions: Enter the address of the activity or mark it directly on the map.
form.event.subtitle.contact_person: Contact details of the organizer are required for contractors.
form.event.subtitle.time: The starting date must be at least one week from now.
form.event.subtitle.tools_and_suplies: Enter required tools and equipment. Contractors ensure the delivery of the right amount of supplies to the site. Litter bags are delivered in rolls, not as individual bags. The minimum amount is 1 roll.
form.event.field.name.label: Name
form.event.field.name.info: Name the activity, e.g. cleanup activity.
form.event.field.description.label: Description (optional field)
form.event.field.description.info: Shortly describe the aim of the activity.
form.event.field.neighborhood.label: Location for dropping off equipment and picking up litter
form.event.field.first_name.label: Forename
form.event.field.last_name.label: Surname
form.event.field.email.label: E-mailaddress
form.event.field.phone.label: Phone number
form.event.field.show_contact_details.he: Do you want your contact information to be displayed publicly on the map and on the activity’s own pages?
form.event.field.cleaning_targets.label: Location of activity
form.event.field.cleaning_targets.info: Specify the location of the activity. For example: Karhupuisto and nearby parks.
form.event.field.details.label: Further information (optional field)
form.event.field.details.info: Under further information, you can notify if you need additional equipment, for example rakes, shovels, brooms or skip containers. Note: Skip containers are delivered only for large events and the contact person listed in the confirmation takes the final decision regarding the delivery.
form.event.field.container.label: Skip
form.event.field.trash_bags.label: 75-litre litter bags (20 bags / roll)
form.event.field.small_trash_bags.label: 30-litre litter bags (50 bags / roll)
form.event.field.trash_pickers.label: Litter pickers
form.event.field.trash_pickers.info: Note: The number of litter pickers is limited to 50 per activity. If you need more, notify the contact person listed in the confirmation and agree to the number of litter pickers required.
form.report.field.year.label: Select year
notification.error.restricted_area: You must log in for this activity!
